DOC.brief_summary: This post-marketing surveillance study (PMS) is conducted to collect safety and efficacy data among subjects with allergic rhinitis, urticaria, eczema, dermatitis, skin irritation, prurigo or pruritus cutaneous who have never been treated with levocetirizine tablets before.
DOC.criteria: Must be the first time for taking levocetirizine tablet As this is PMS study, there are no exclusion criteria.
